krogenlund wrote:

> Hi,
> 
> I have a small problem using TestSuites. We organise our tests such
> that there is a test suite for each package, and one for the entire
> project. The project level suite aggregates the package suites. The
> problem is that when running the project level suite it says that
> there's no tests defined for the package level suites. When I run the
> package suites however things are ok! What could be wrong - I'm
> relatively new to JUnit.

Look at the source code for TestSuite.addTestSuite(Class). I am going by 
memory, but I believe that it /does not/ look for a suite() method in 
the test case class, but just for tests (methods like public void 
testXyz()). It is, in my opinion, not the right behavior.

I strongly suggest that you either use

  * <batchtest> Ant task
  * JUnit-addons DirectorySuiteBuilder
  * GSBase RecursiveTestSuite

to collect all the tests for your project. Make the computer do the work.

Take care.
